fields.name: category
fields.title: Category
fields.description: A category related to this product.

fields.name: discontinued
fields.title: Discontinued
fields.description: Indicates whether this product is discontinued or not.

fields.name: isRelatedTo
fields.title: Is Related to
fields.description: A pointer to another, somehow related product (or multiple products).

fields.name: isSimilarTo
fields.title: Is Similar to
fields.description: A pointer to another, functionally similar product (or multiple products).

fields.name: model
fields.title: Model
fields.description: The model of the product. Use with the URL of a ProductModel or a textual representation of the model identifier. The URL of the ProductModel can be from an external source. It is recommended to additionally provide strong product identifiers via the gtin8/gtin13/gtin14 and mpn properties.

fields.name: productID
fields.title: Product ID
fields.description: The product identifier, such as ISBN. For example: <meta itemprop='productID' content='isbn:123-456-789'/>.

fields.name: releaseDate
fields.title: Release Date
fields.description: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.

constraints.description: The model number must be unique across different records.
